page.title: 08The village Church.
page.content: Crawford Parish Church is linked with the village churches in Elvanfoot, Leadhills and Wanlockhead.The minister for the four churches is Reverend Baillie.He lives at present in Leadhills as the manse in Crawford has just been sold.A new manse is being built in Crawford. The church in Elvanfoot is soon to close and the people will then worship in Crawford Church. Crawford Church was built in 1975.It is a lovely building with some very attractive stained glass windows. Before the present church building was built the church was on another site near the river.At this time it was called St.Constantine's Church. Reverend Baillie visits our school once a fortnight to take our school assembly.
